scripts.link:smooth-dnd: cd lib/smooth-dnd && npm link && cd ../.. && npm link smooth-dnd
scripts.link:vue-smooth-dnd: cd lib/vue-smooth-dnd && npm link && npm link smooth-dnd && cd ../.. && npm link vue-smooth-dnd
scripts.release: sh -c 'npm version $VERSION' && npm run bundle && sh -c 'git tag $VERSION' && git push --tags && git push
scripts.bundle: rm -rf build/ && npm run build && cd dist/ && sh -c 'sed -i "s/1.0.0/$VERSION/g" manifest.json' && sh -c 'bestzip ../release/v$VERSION.zip *'
